# Comatose (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 12]]

**Casting Time:** One standard action

**Components:** S,M (a mixture of ground spices)

**Range:** Close (25 feet + 5 feet/two levels)

**Target:** One living creature

**Duration:** One hour/level

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Book of Experimental Might I (Malhavoc Press), pg. 55

You put a living creature in a coma. The subject falls prone immediatelyâ€”alive, but unable to take actions.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Name changed from *coma* to *comatose* to avoid duplication.
